articles.author: RIO YAMAT and KEN RITTER Associated Press
articles.title: FBI documents give new view into Las Vegas shooter's mindset - ABC News
articles.description: A trove of FBI documents made public this week offers a new view into high-stakes gambler Stephen Paddock’s mindset before he carried out the deadliest mass shooting in modern America
articles.content: LAS VEGAS -- The high-stakes gambler who carried out the deadliest mass shooting in modern America, killing 60 and injuring hundreds more in Las Vegas, was apparently angry over how the casinos were … [+4409 chars]

articles.title: US Urges Americans In Russia To Leave "Immediately" - NDTV
articles.description: US State Department Secretary Antony Blinken on Thursday requested the Americans living in Russia to leave the country "immediately", after the reporter was arrested in Moscow.
articles.content:
Antony Blinken requested the Americans living in Russia to leave the country. (File)
